DOC.brief_summary: Waiting for a proof by mycological culture is usually necessary before starting a systemic antifungal therapy. It therefore seems to us interesting to evaluate the benefit of using dermoscopy in clinical diagnosis of Tinea Capitis.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of Trichoscopy in the Diagnosis of Tinea Capitis
DOC.criteria: All patients with clinically diagnosed tinea capitis Patient has signed informed consent Patient with kerion or tinea favosa Antifungal treatment within 15 days prior to inclusion
